articles.title: 2025 LDV Terron 9 price and specs: New ute joins smaller T60
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: LDV developed the new-generation Terron 9 to meet the evolving requirements of customers who value space and comfort. The development reflects the changing demands on these vehicles.

articles.title: Pajama Factory launches fresh produce initiative through farm partnership
articles.summary: The Pajama Factory, in partnership with a local farm, is launching a Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) program to provide locally grown, organic fruits and vegetables to residents. The CSA program will run from August through October, with weekly Thursday pick-ups at the Pajama Factory. Participants can also opt to receive fresh, pastured eggs.

articles.title: This Handy Device Can Clean Your Phone
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: PhoneSoap has released a third-generation model of their UV-C sanitizing device. The device provides 360-degree disinfection for phones and other small items in 10 minutes, utilizing UV-C light. It can also charge your phone while sanitizing and serves as an alternative to chemical cleaners.

articles.title: SXTC-DYADICA Releases Groundbreaking White Paper on AI 5.0: The Future of Brand-Driven Artificial Intelligence
articles.summary: DYADICA and SXTC Global released the AI 5.0 framework, a brand-driven approach to AI deployment, which captures the application of AI across all facets of branding. It offers a blueprint for brands seeking to leverage AI and serves as a practical guide for brand-led AI integration.

articles.title: Target tests smartphone tech to unlock anti-theft cases
articles.summary: Target is currently testing a new smartphone-based system. This system aims to combat theft within Target stores.

articles.title: Types of AI services that can be produced with chat GPT and WordPress/Example -Marketing -Information Sharing
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: WordPress users can now monetize their websites using new AI services. These include AI Music and Lyrics Creation Service, AI Image Prompt Creation Service, AI Webtoon Creation Service, AI Virtual Model Image Creation Service, and AI Landing Page Automatic Production Service. These services offer functionalities such as automatic content generation and streamlined landing page creation, enabling users to generate revenue through various monetization strategies like advertising and membership sites.

articles.title: We are recovering from the situation and sharing Israel's tasty news
articles.summary: Ferrero promotes Nutella.

articles.title: Amazon is selling fantastic summer gadget for ‘night sweats' to keep you cool through hot summer nights
articles.author: Jordan Farrell
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a Cooling Blanket for Night Sweats for £10.99. The blanket is designed with special materials to promote airflow and stop overheating, available in a variety of sizes and colours. It regulates body temperature and humidity by absorbing and disposing unnecessary body heat.

articles.title: TikTokers Are Basically Obsessed With These 27 Beauty Products
articles.summary: Several beauty and skincare products are gaining traction due to TikTok recommendations. These include Elizavecca Cer-100 Protein Treatment for hair, Avarelle pimple patches, Maybelline's Instant Age Rewind Concealer, and makeup setting sprays, all noted for their effectiveness and positive user experiences. These products are readily available for purchase on platforms like Amazon and Sephora.

articles.title: TikTokers Are Basically Obsessed With These 27 Beauty Products
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: Elizavecca introduced a new hair treatment for dry and damaged hair, applied after shampooing for a luxurious mane. Essence launched Lash Princess mascara, enhancing lashes with a cone-shaped fiber brush for a clump-free formula. E.l.f. released Poreless Putty primer with squalane, blurring pores and hydrating skin, while Dior presented a lip glow oil, providing a glossy, tinted look with cherry oil for lip protection. Nyx launched a brow glue for sculpting arches and a mechanical eyeliner for effortless wing creation, alongside a vegan setting spray that keeps makeup in place for up to 16 hours. Maybelline introduced Instant Age Rewind concealer with goji berry and Haloxyl to cover under-eye bags, and Fanola launched "No Yellow" purple shampoo to neutralize yellow tones in blonde hair. Finally, Paula's Choice released a 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant, removing dead skin, shrinking pores, and smoothing wrinkles.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil Tri-Fold handset with Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7: Report
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung plans to unveil its first tri-fold smartphone, possibly named Galaxy G Fold, alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. The launch is expected to coincide with the Galaxy Unpacked event, which may also include updates on Project Moohan (Samsung's Android XR headset) and a teaser for upcoming AR glasses. The Galaxy G Fold might launch commercially in October.

articles.title: AWS opens applications for 2025 generative AI startup accelerator
articles.author: Erika Mioten
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has opened applications for the third cohort of its AWS Generative AI Accelerator (GAIA) program, a global initiative aimed at scaling early-stage startups focused on developing foundational generative AI technologies. The program offers selected startups up to $1 million in AWS credits, technical mentorship, and go-to-market support, beginning on October 13, 2025, in Seattle.

articles.title: Reader-approved spring deals are making a Prime Day comeback!
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 will take place from July 8th to July 11th, featuring deals on various products. Several items are already on sale including TruSkin Vitamin C Serum, Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds, Shark Steam Mop, and Medicube Pore Pads.

articles.title: Chinese cities accelerate growth of 'debut economy' to boost consumption
articles.summary: China is promoting its "debut economy," focusing on new product and service launches. Shanghai saw the opening of 365 new flagship stores between January and May. A China-French agricultural bazaar in Shenyang introduced 16 French food and beverage brands to the province for the first time.

articles.title: Official: Samsung to announce new foldables on July 9
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil new products including the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7, Galaxy Watch 8 and Watch Ultra 2025 models. The event will also feature the new One UI 8 system and advanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: Truelogic launches service to boost brands in the AI search era
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Truelogic has launched an AI Search Optimization Service to help brands maintain visibility in Google Search as AI-generated answers become more prevalent. The service includes an AI Visibility Check, content upgrades, performance improvements, and authority-building strategies to help brands adapt to changes in online search behavior and improve their chances of being featured in AI-generated summaries.

articles.title: The Xbox ROG Ally might just change what the "Xbox" label represents
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing an "aggregated gaming library" to allow users to play games across different devices (Xbox, PC, mobile) using a single library. This system will integrate with PC game stores like Steam, allowing for a unified gaming experience across platforms. Microsoft will be updating Windows 11, wherein the Xbox app will become a one-stop destination for the users to play games.

articles.title: 30 Under-The-Radar Amazon Finds
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to blur pores and control oil. Maybelline launched a volumizing brow mousse. The LoudCup, a 20-ounce tumbler with a built-in stadium horn was also introduced.

articles.title: Middle of Lidl launches huge summer bedding & homeware sale with prices starting at just £3.99
articles.author: Alex Lancaster-Lennox
articles.summary: Lidl has launched a summer bedding and homeware sale in its middle aisle, starting June 29th. The sale includes items such as Livarno neck support pillows (£10.99), muslin bed linen sets (£24.99/£29.99), Renforce BedLinen range (£9.99/£11.99/£13.99), and jersey fitted sheets (£3.99), as well as bath towels (£4.99) and mats (£5.99).

articles.title: Roborock Prime Day: Qrevo & Q Series Robot Cleaners on Sale!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Roborock is launching new robot vacuum models, the Qrevo and Q Series, for Prime Day. The Q Series features models like the Q7 M5+ and Q10 S5+, offering powerful suction, advanced mopping, and obstacle avoidance. The Qrevo series includes the QV 35A and Qrevo S5V, providing all-in-one functionality with self-cleaning, self-drying, and auto-refilling capabilities.

articles.title: New and unofficial renders show how thin the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 could be – and we also have hints for when they'll go on sale
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 9, with sales potentially starting in August. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is predicted to be thinner than its predecessor and will feature a punch-hole camera on the main display, while a tri-fold handset may launch in October.

articles.title: McDonald's brings back experimental menu item 13 years later
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching the Daily Double burger nationwide until the end of 2025, after testing it in select locations over a decade ago. Starting July 22, customers can order the Daily Double as their entrée for the McValue Meal Deal for a limited time. McDonald's also introduced the new McValue menu in January, featuring budget-friendly deals for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

articles.title: Java at 30: New Features Still Brewing
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: J.P. Morgan Asset Management (JPMAM) introduced two actively managed exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX). The new listings include the JPMorgan US Value Active ETF (JAVA).

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Best deals on home, beauty and tech buys
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is launching the Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale, starting July 8th and running until July 11th. They are introducing 'Today's Big Deals' with daily themes and 'New Deal Drop' deals launching at midnight each day for Prime members who can access these deals with an Amazon Prime membership.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 to launch on July 8: India price, specs and everything we know so far
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the Nord CE 5 smartphone at its Summer Launch Event on July 8. The Nord CE 5 is expected to feature a 6.77-inch flat OLED display, a 7,100mAh battery with 80W fast charging, and a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate chipset. The phone is tipped to include a dual rear camera system with a 50-megapixel primary sensor and is expected to launch in the Rs 25,000 price range.

articles.title: Microsoft's Copilot+ has been here over a year and I still don't care about it — but I do wish I had one of its features
articles.author: Richard Devine
articles.summary: Microsoft is pushing Copilot+ PCs with features like 'Click to Do' and 'Recall', but the author finds that the Snapdragon chips are the real selling point for these laptops. The ASUS VivoBook S 15 is highlighted as a good laptop and it's Auto SR feature is impressive, but the author believes the focus should be on the PC's performance and not the Copilot+ label.

articles.title: 24 Products To Master The Art Of Carry-On Only
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products designed to enhance travel convenience and personal care. Featured items include the Subtl Beauty Stack, a customizable makeup set, and a TSA-friendly Neutrogena SPF 50 sunscreen stick. Additionally, a travel Gillette razor and a portable espresso maker are highlighted for maintaining personal care routines and coffee needs on the go.

articles.title: Laundry services in Singapore: Price comparison of 8 affordable laundromats (2025), Money News
articles.summary: The article introduces and compares various laundry services in Singapore, including LaundryMart, Mr Dobi Laundry Services, Eazihome, Laundryheap, Piing, For the Love of Laundry, Astoria Dry Cleaning Services, and Presto Drycleaners. These services offer diverse options from express wash and dry cleaning to 24-hour collection and delivery, catering to different laundry needs and preferences with varying price points.

articles.title: New car wash may be coming to Middlesex County
articles.author: Susan Loyer
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash is seeking approval to build an automated car wash at 3703 Route 1 in South Brunswick. The proposed facility will include a drive-through lane, 22 vacuum parking spaces, and signage. Spark Car Wash plans to expand with new locations in Piscataway, Flemington, North Brunswick and Linden.

articles.title: 54 Summer Products Reviewers Call Magic
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Multiple companies have introduced new products. Cushionaire launched cork-bottom sandals. Owala released the Freesip insulated bottle. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Messy Eater launched a stain remover. L'Oreal released True Match Lumi Glotion. E.l.f. launched Camo liquid blush. Elizabeth Mott released Thank Me Later eyeshadow primer. Peach Slices launched Smoothing Solution Ingrown Hair Treatment. AquaGuard has pre-swim hair cream. One/Size launched On 'Til Dawn waterproof setting spray. Gold Bond launched Friction Defense. Sol de Janeiro released Brazilian Bum Bum Cream. Burt's Bees launched sunburn soother. Levoit introduced compact air purifier. Oxo launched Cold Brew Rapid Brewer.

articles.title: Price drop on robot vacuum cleaner: Best time to shop now at up to 80% off
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of new features and discounts on various robot vacuum cleaners from brands like Dreame, ECOVACS, NARWAL, ILIFE, and Xiaomi. These include models like the Dreame D10 Plus Gen 2, ECOVACS Deebot Y1 Pro and N20 Pro, NARWAL Freo X Plus and Ultra, ILIFE T20s and A80 Pro, Dreame L10 Prime and L10s Ultra, and Xiaomi Robot Vacuum Cleaner X10, which feature improved suction power, battery life, navigation, and smart features. The robots offer a hands-free cleaning experience using technologies like LiDAR navigation, automatic dust emptying, and voice assistant compatibility.

articles.title: WhatsApp Ads: Head Cathcart on Messenger's Future
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: WhatsApp is introducing advertisements on its platform, specifically within channels and the status tab. This change is driven by the need for sustainable revenue to support infrastructure, security, and future development. The move has implications for user experience and data privacy.

articles.title: 32 Products To Help You Scratch Those "I Have To Get Every Little Bit Clean" Itches
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: The article introduces a wide array of new cleaning products and tools. These include items like the Pink Miracle shoe cleaner, cleaning paste (The Pink Stuff), specialized brushes for cleaning vinyl records and window tracks, various cleaning solutions, and the Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator, as well as tools such as a squeegee broom, automatic scrubbing brush and a rechargeable air blaster, each designed to address specific cleaning tasks efficiently.

articles.title: Best Hotpoint washing machines under £500: Affordable and efficient
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Hotpoint has introduced the GentlePower H7 99 U washing machine, a 9kg capacity model boasting 'A-30 per cent' energy efficiency. It features a 1400rpm spin speed, 14 wash programs, a direct drive motor, and 'Steam 3.0' technology for hygiene, refreshing, and crease-free results.

articles.title: Samsung fans rush to snap up £5 Galaxy Tab A9+ that shoppers use 'every day'
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Sky is offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ tablet for £5 per month as part of a new deal. The 11-inch tablet features 64GB of storage, front and rear cameras, and a 5,100mAh battery. The tablet is also available for purchase outright from retailers like Amazon for less than £200.

articles.title: Haier and Abenson unveil the future of home entertainment with the launch of the Haier Mini LED TV
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: Haier Philippines, in partnership with Abenson, launched the Haier Mini LED TV, featuring True Color Pro technology, ultra-fine contrast from mini LED backlighting, 4K HDR resolution, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, Game Mode Pro, and AI-powered smart home compatibility. The TV is available at Abenson stores and online.

articles.title: Convenience store of the 'future' opens powered by AI and robots
articles.author: Zesha Saleem
articles.summary: Lawson introduced Real x Lawson, a futuristic convenience store in Tokyo. The store utilizes AI and robots to automate tasks such as cooking Kara-age Kun fried chicken and floor cleaning. Lawson aims to establish this tech-driven concept as a new standard.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 launch timeline leaked: Expected to come with One UI 8, smarter AI, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9th, along with a potential tri-fold smartphone, the Galaxy G Fold. While the Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 are expected to be released soon, the Galaxy G Fold is anticipated to launch in October. The event may also provide information on the Galaxy Watch 8 series and future AR/XR products.

articles.title: New Android phone boasts clever tricks Apple and Samsung won't match
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Fairphone has launched the Fairphone 6, an Android smartphone with a modular design and sustainable manufacturing. The phone features a physical switch called 'Fairphone Moments' to toggle between a full Android experience and a minimal setup. It also boasts ethically sourced materials and e-waste neutrality.

articles.title: Dunelm selling £27 'carpet shampooer' gadget that 'freshens carpets fuss free'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Dunelm has launched the Ewbank Compact Carpet Shampooer with Shampoo, priced at £27, on its website. This new gadget features a two-litre tank with a dual nylon brush and is designed for quick refreshes and deep cleans of carpets. Amazon is also selling Vax Dual Power Carpet Cleaner for £99.99.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: 38 Best Deals
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Revlon's product 'One-Step Dryer and Volumizer Brush' features image data for responsive web design, utilizing consistent 4:3 aspect ratios and multiple sizes for different screen resolutions.  Images include a portrait, a before & after scenario, and the brush itself.

articles.title: Support neni entrepreneurs this summer at Bonita Baby
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: The Nenpire and Bonita Baby launched "The Nenpire Launch Pad Corner," a space within Bonita Baby store dedicated to showcasing young entrepreneurs and their products. This initiative features businesses like 'Sleepy Sprouts,' 'Cards by Chi,' 'Guihan Art,' and 'Riley's Art Studio,' providing them with a platform to expand their presence in the community.

articles.title: New Look's 'beautiful' £27 midi dress 'fits well and looks lovely'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look is promoting their Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, currently on sale for £26.99. The dress, available in multiple colors and sizes, features a woven material, relaxed midi fit, square neckline, and puffed sleeves. Customer reviews praise the dress's quality, versatility, and appearance, although some note sizing issues.

articles.title: New Look's 'beautiful' £27 dress 'fits well and looks lovely'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, currently on sale for £26.99. The dress features a woven material, a square neckline, short, puffed sleeves with elasticated trim, and an elasticated waist panel and is available in multiple colors and a range of sizes. Customer reviews praise the dress's versatility and appearance, although some note sizing issues.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' £27 midi dress 'feels much more expensive'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its "Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress", currently on sale for £26.99. The dress features a woven material, a relaxed midi fit, a square neckline, short, puffed sleeves with elasticated trim, and an elasticated waist panel. Customer reviews indicate generally positive experiences, praising the dress's versatility and appearance, although some mention sizing issues.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 2 price drop ahead of Nothing Phone 3 launch: Get dark grey, 128 GB variant at up to Rs. 25, 000 discount
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: The Nothing Phone 2 is now available at a discounted price of Rs 27,997 on Amazon, a significant drop from its original launch price of Rs 44,999. This price reduction coincides with anticipation for the upcoming launch of the Nothing Phone 3. The Phone 2 offers features such as a transparent rear panel, Glyph interface, and Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chipset.

articles.title: If You Love Looking Fancy Without The Fancy Price Tag, These 30 Walmart Pieces Are Calling Your Name
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of clothing and accessory items, including dresses, pants, blouses, jumpsuits, bags, tops, jeans, flats, shirts, and shoes, available at various retailers. It emphasizes product features, customer reviews, pricing, and availability across different sizes and colors, representing a variety of new products.

articles.title: I've been using Android 16 for two weeks — here's why I'm so underwhelmed
articles.author: Tom Pritchard
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16 earlier than previous versions, but many of its key features, such as Material Expressive 3 redesign and Desktop Windowing, are not yet available. Live Updates is also advertised but not currently functional, leading to criticism that the update feels unfinished and similar to Android 15. The Android 16 is released for Pixel phones only.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: Does the slim phone pack the punch?
articles.author: Alvin R Cabral
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a 5.8mm thickness and the Galaxy AI platform. The device sports a dual-lens camera system with a 200MP main sensor and incorporates Samsung's Now Bar for app control, positioning it as a lifestyle device.

articles.title: Haier and Abenson unveil the future of home entertainment with the launch of the Haier Mini LED TV
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Haier Philippines, in partnership with Abenson, has launched the Haier Mini LED TV. The TV features True Color Pro technology, ultra-fine contrast from mini LED backlighting, 4K HDR resolution, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, Game Mode Pro, and voice-activated controls. It is available at Abenson stores and online.

articles.title: 29 Productive Things To Help You Avoid Ever Working *Too* Hard
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The content presents a variety of new products designed to simplify everyday tasks. These include items like Zep foaming wall cleaner, a Click & Carry Grocery Bag Carrier, a WD-40 pen, SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher, and Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger. Additionally, the content mentions a self-cleaning litter box that is controllable from a smartphone.

articles.title: Gadgets Weekly: ViewSonic M1X, M1 Max TV projectors and more
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: ViewSonic introduced M1X and M1 Max projectors. Sony unveiled BRAVIA 5 XR Mini LED TV and Sony Alpha 1 II camera. Samsung launched Bespoke AI Laundry Combo washing machine and Galaxy Buds Core, while opening pre-reservation for next-gen Galaxy foldable phones. Asus released Chromebook CX14 and Poco launched F7 phone. Google announced Gemini CLI AI agent. OnePlus offers doorstep device pickup and delivery service in India. Dyson released Global Wet Cleaning Study 2025.

articles.title: Why Perth Is the Smart Expansion Play for Neocloud Providers considering Singapore (NEXTDC Limited)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Neocloud providers are making strategic infrastructure decisions related to GPU-as-a-Service (GPUaaS) and specialized AI platforms in the Asia-Pacific region due to growing global demand. The increasing demand suggests a focus on new AI services and/or the expansion of existing ones.

articles.title: Verizon's new deal is so crazy good that Reddit wonders if it's real
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A phone company is offering a new wireless deal. The deal is characterized as being remarkably good.

articles.title: Death Stranding 2 Is The Closest We'll Get To Metal Gear Solid 5 Sequel
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Konami is releasing a brand new Metal Gear Solid game. This is the introduction of a new video game product.

articles.title: Burger Singh's saucy new twist in the franchise development model
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Burger Singh is experimenting with a new co-investment franchise model. This model represents a change in how Burger Singh approaches franchising.

articles.title: Stewart's Shops Releases New Convenient Accessory For Summer
articles.author: Allison
articles.summary: Stewart's Shops has launched a new 'retro' fanny pack insulated cooler, available on their online shop. The fanny pack is designed to hold snacks, drinks, and even two pints of ice cream. Facebook users have reacted positively to the new product, praising its design and functionality.
